config.title: Workspace Sidebar
config.actions.cur-window: Open in the current window, icon clicks will open in a new window.
config.actions.description: What action should be taken when clicking on a workspace in the sidebar?
config.actions.new-window: Open in a new window, icon clicks will open in the current window.
config.cleanLabels.description: Cleanup workspace file names by turning underscores/hyphens into spaces and formatting to Title Case. Uncheck to leave workspace file names as is.
config.condenseFileTree.description: Condense the file tree to reduce visual noise from folders. [See the readme for more information](https://github.com/sketchbuch/vsc-workspace-sidebar#readme).
config.depth.description: What depth of subfolders should also be looked in. Range: 0-25
config.excludeHiddenFolders.description: Exclude hidden folders when searching for workspaces. This can speed up searching.
config.folder.deprecationMessage: Multiple root folders are now supported. Please use 'workspaceSidebar.rootFolders' instead. This option will be removed in a future version.
config.folder.description: The folder to look in for workspace files - leave blank to default to your home folder. '~' will be replaced with your home folder even on windows.
config.folders.excluded.description: Folders to exclude when looking for workspaces.
config.rootFolders.description: The folders to look in for workspace files
config.search.matchStart.description: Search from the beginning of workspace name
config.searchMinimum.description: The minimum number of workspace files required for the search box to be displayed. 0 will always show the search box. Range: 0-100
config.showFileIcons.description: EXPERIMENTAL FEATURE. Show file icons next to workspaces, matching is mostly automatic, but can be configured. [See the readme for more information](https://github.com/sketchbuch/vsc-workspace-sidebar#readme).
config.showFileIconsConfig.description: EXPERIMENTAL FEATURE. Custom matching config for icons. [See the readme for more information](https://github.com/sketchbuch/vsc-workspace-sidebar#readme).
config.showFolderHierarchy.description: Show file tree instead of a flat list.
config.showPaths.asneeded: Show paths when a workspace has the same label as another
config.showPaths.description: Display paths to the workspace files in the sidebar. Either: 'Always', 'Never', or 'As needed' (only shows paths for workspaces with the same label).
views.title: Workspaces
viewsContainers.activitybar.title: Workspaces

fetch.title: An error occured whilst collecting workspace files.

default.title: Something went wrong whilst collecting workspaces.

isFile.description: Check that the {{settingsLink}} are actually folders
isFile.title: All of the root folders are files.

nonexistent.title: None of the root folders exist.

noRootFolders.description: Specify one or more {{settingsLink}} in which to look for workspaces.
noRootFolders.title: No root folders specified.

noWorkspaces.descriptionDepth: The current search depth is 0 for all root folders, this means that no subfolders are searched in for workspace files.
noWorkspaces.descriptionSettings: Try increasing the {{settingsLinkDepth}} or change the {{settingsLinkRootFolder}} settings.
noWorkspaces.title: Folders contain no workspaces

default.title: Something went wrong whilst collecting workspaces.

isFile.description: Check that the {{settingsLink}} is actually a folder.
isFile.title: The folder is a file not a directory.

openFilemanager.ariaLabel: Open folder containing '{{label}}' in your file manager
openFilemanager.tooltip: Open folder containing '{{label}}' in your file manager

noWorkspaces.descriptionDepth: The current search depth is 0, this means that no subfolders are searched in for workspace files.
noWorkspaces.descriptionSettings: Try increasing the {{settingsLinkDepth}} or change the {{settingsLinkRootFolder}} settings.
noWorkspaces.title: No workspace files found.

search.noMatch: No workspaces matched your search terms

loading.descriptionWithHidden: If this is taking a long time, try and exclude {{settingsLinkRootFolder}} or {{settingsLinkHidden}}.
loading.description: If this is taking a long time, try and exclude {{settingsLinkRootFolder}}.
loading.title: Collecting workspaces...
